alert.note: Alert for Coastal Franklin; Coastal Jefferson; Coastal Taylor; Coastal Wakulla; Inland Dixie; Inland Franklin; Inland Jefferson; Inland Taylor; Inland Wakulla; Lafayette (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 4:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Lafayette, southeastern Wakulla, southwestern Jefferson, central Taylor and northeastern Franklin Counties through 530 PM EDT... At 458 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Mayo to 17 miles south of St. Marks to 6 miles northwest of Carrabelle. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Carrabelle, Mayo, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Pinland, Shadeville, Jug Island, Royal Bluff, St George Island St Pk, Panacea, Scanlon, Medart, Foley, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Liveoak Island, Curtis Mill, Saint Teresa, Bald Point and Hyde Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for Big Bend of Florida.
